text:
Both: We´re going to the circus. Going to
the circus.

Hey, hello.
Oh, hello.

We are going to the circus.
Yeah!

I like the clowns.
Do you like clowns?

Yeah!
Yeah. Great.

Hey, Steve, look!
Hey, Maggie. Look, Maggie´s found a poster

for the circus.
Yeah!

Look at the clowns. Wow! And hey, look. There
is a tall clown.

This clown?
Yeah. Look, it´s a tall clown.

Yeah!
So say it with me. It´s a tall clown. And

again. It´s a tall clown. One more time.
Both: It´s a tall clown.

Yeah, great. But come on. Let´s go to the
circus.

Yeah! Oh, hey, let´s have some fun. Time
for some Maggie magic. Abracadabra!

Going to the circus. Hey, look at me! I am
a tall clown.

Yeah!
A tall clown. That was lucky. Hey, what´s

going on? Oh look! Another poster for the
circus. Let´s go and have a look.

Maggie: Yeah!
Wow! Look at these clowns. Oh, look at this

clown.
Yeah! This one?

Yeah. Is it a tall clown?
Both: No.

It´s a short clown. So come on say it with
me. What is it? It´s a short clown. That´s

right. It´s a short clown. And again. Come
on.

Both: It´s a short clown.
Yeah, well done!

Maggie: Yeah!
But come on, let´s go to the circus. We´re

going to the circus.
Maggie: Abracadabra!

Hey, look at me. I am a short clown.
Maggie: Yeah!

A short clown. That was crazy. Was I a short
clown…

Maggie: Yeah!
Steve: …on a unicycle?

Maggie: Yeah!
Oh, it must be Maggie magic! Maggie, stop

being silly! I want to go to the circus. So
come on, let´s go.

Ok. Going to the circus. Oh, hey, look. Steve!
Come back! Steve!

What Maggie? What is it?
Look, another poster.

Oh yeah, look! It´s another poster for the
circus.

Maggie: Yeah!
And hey, look at this clown.

This clown!
Yeah! Look, it´s a fat clown. So say it with

me. Come on. It´s a fat clown. And again.
It´s a fat clown. One more time.

Both: It´s a fat clown.
Maggie: Yeah!

That´s right. But Maggie, I don´t want to
be a fat clown. OK?

Abracadabra!
Oh, Maggie, you´ve changed me into a big

fat clown.
Maggie: Yeah!

Look, I am fat.
Maggie: Very fat.

Uh, cake! Oh, Maggie! Change me back, now!
Maggie: Ok.

That´s better. But Maggie, stop being so
naughty.

Maggie: Sorry.
Because look, we´re here. We´re at the circus!
